description: Welcome to Freemont Indigo! This 1338 sq ft beautifully designed 3-bedroom, 2.5-bathroom townhome offers comfort, style & convenience in one of the area's most sought-after communities. Featuring a spacious tandem garage, this home boasts an open-concept main level with a bright & airy living, dining & kitchen area flooded with natural light. Upstairs, you'll find a generous primary bedroom complete with a private ensuite, double sinks, & closet space, along with two additional bedrooms & a full bathroom. Bonus laundry on upper level. Exclusive access to The River Club - an amenity center offering indoor and outdoor pools, hot tub, sauna, gym & clubhouse. Walking distance to shopping, parks & trails. Open House Sat Nov 8 from 1-3pm!
